snippet: RAYMOND--Mary, 90 years old of Closter, NJ. Beloved wife of the late Mort, and survived by her children Jerry and Marisbel Raymond and Ronnie Ellen Raymond, grandchildren Harry Raymond, Abigail Frost and her husband, Bradley, great- granddaughter Caroline Frost, and sister Lillian Wilbur. Service 12 noon, Tuesday at Gutterman and Musicant, 402 Park Street, Hackensack, NJ. Memorial contributions may be directed to Education Programs at Van Vleck House and Gardens, Montclair, NJ, or the Student Scholarship Fund of Hunter College, New York City. 1/3
